pkgmetadata.longdescription: Truncated Positive Normal Model and Extensions // Provide data generation and estimation tools for the truncated positive normal (tpn) model discussed in Gomez, Olmos, Varela and Bolfarine (2018) doi:10.1007/s11766-018-3354-x, the slash tpn distribution discussed in Gomez, Gallardo and Santoro (2021) doi:10.3390/sym13112164, the bimodal tpn distribution discussed in Gomez et al. (2022) doi:10.3390/sym14040665, the flexible tpn model doi:10.3390/math11214431 and the unit tpn distribution doi:10.1016/j.chemolab.2025.105322.
